resource.descriptor: Form: (Module Nurse & Doctor Duty) - Nurse & Doctor Duty
Form: (Module Active Patients) - Record Notes & Flags
Form: (Module Maternal Indicators) - Remove Maternal Indicators

xpath.function: if($next_exam < 0, concat('Next exam late by ', $next_exam_string, ''), concat('Time until next exam: ', $next_exam_string))
